name: Energi Norge (Energy Norway)
membership: Energy Norway is a member of Eurelectric and also participate in parts of Business Europes activity
goal: Energy Norway is an association with Norwegian Energy Companies (generation, network, supply) as members. Goals are to promote framework conditions for members and promote the use of renewables.Also an employers association.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy Union, Electricity Market (wholesale and retails), infrastructure , All Climate and Energy policy issues
